records.location_details: Bodies of three migrants found in Turkey close to the Greek border, allegedly after being forced back by Greek Police across the Evros River.
records.where_clear: Turkey, near the Greek border, by the Evros River
records.location_text_raw: in Turkey close to the Greek border. According to a migrant apprehended by Turkish authorities at least one of the dead migrants was part of a group of migrants who were forced back to Turkey by Greek Police after having reached Greece by crossing the Evros River.

possible_violations.violation_name: Alleged pushback by Greek Police resulting in deaths

records.context_note: Bodies of three migrants found in Turkey close to the Greek border, allegedly after being forced back by Greece.
records.evidence_quote: 3 dead migrants found in Turkey close to the Greek border. According to a migrant apprehended by Turkish authorities at least one of the dead migrants was part of a group of migrants who were forced back to Turkey by Greek Police after having reached Greece by crossing the Evros River.
